Package org.apache.xalan.lib

Extension elements and functions shipped with Xalan-Java, including EXSLT functions.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ExsltBase The base class for some EXSLT extension classes.
ExsltCommon This class contains EXSLT common extension functions.
ExsltDatetime This class contains EXSLT dates and times extension functions.
ExsltDynamic This class contains EXSLT dynamic extension functions.
ExsltMath This class contains EXSLT math extension functions.
ExsltSets This class contains EXSLT set extension functions.
ExsltStrings This class contains EXSLT strings extension functions.
ExsltStrings.DocumentHolder This class is not loaded until first referenced (see Java Language Specification by Gosling/Joy/Steele, section 12.4.1) The static members are created when this class is first referenced, as a lazy initialization not needing checking against null or any synchronization.
Extensions This class contains many of the Xalan-supplied extensions.
Extensions.DocumentHolder This class is not loaded until first referenced (see Java Language Specification by Gosling/Joy/Steele, section 12.4.1) The static members are created when this class is first referenced, as a lazy initialization not needing checking against null or any synchronization.
NodeInfo NodeInfo defines a set of XSLT extension functions to be used from stylesheets.
ObjectFactory This class is duplicated for each JAXP subpackage so keep it in sync.
PipeDocument PipeDocument is a Xalan extension element to set stylesheet params and pipes an XML document through a series of 1 or more stylesheets.
Redirect Implements three extension elements to allow an XSLT transformation to redirect its output to multiple output files.
SecuritySupport This class is duplicated for each Xalan-Java subpackage so keep it in sync.
 

Error Summary
ObjectFactory.ConfigurationError A configuration error.
 

Package org.apache.xalan.lib Description

Extension elements and functions shipped with Xalan-Java, including EXSLT functions.

We are adding extensions to this package.
